newsitem.title: USA: GPU restores power to 11,500 N.J. customers.
newsitem.headline: GPU restores power to 11,500 N.J. customers.

text.p: GPU Energy restored service to almost all 11,500 customers in northern New Jersey, whose power was interrupted by strong winds and heavy rain Tuesday evening, the company said Wednesday.
The stormy conditions snapped local distribution lines carrying power to those affected customers.
"It was the high winds that caused tree limbs to fall on the wires," said company spokesman Jim Kern, adding there was no damage to the region's high-voltage transmission lines.
This afternoon, only 51 of those customers were without service, he said.
GPU Energy provides electric service to 940,000 customers in New Jersey.
